name: Bee Strong
description:
"When you go in search of honey 
you must expect to be stung by bees."

Oh no! The bears' flying village can't go up because the evil bees took their honey. (energy) Player, please, help Barry The Bear to return the honey to his home!



To win this game you need to go through all 3 the sky islands (levels), get to the Bee Castle and win in the battle against the Queen. 

The controls are simple. Click on the bees to confuse them. But BEE careful! Some bees are sneaky, some of them are kind (don't punch them :P), so use your reaction in your unBEARable adventure (Why "unbearable"? Because if one bee touch you it's game over)

The Creator's Note: 

I want to say "thanks" to you if you played this game and to my best friend who helped to make the most of the songs in this game (She is very shy and didn't want me to put her name)
Also,  it is my first "serious" videogame and also it's my first gamejam https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-110 :) And I really enjoyed this experience) It gave me motivation to create awesome games in the future!
I will be very happy to hear your feedback :>

I, Beligto Zimin, hope that you will like this game and remember... BEE STRONG
